trial_phase.Description: Wether it is ITI or trial phase

condition.Description: Which condition: CS+, CS-, Baseline or None

n_grips.Description: Number of grips during the trial

rewarded_response.Description: The response that was rewarded on this trial

Levels.PIT: No time window rewarded AKA exctinction
